original_title: Der Ganze Körper fühlt sich leicht und möchte fliegen
overview: Experimental film, Polke plays Polke, Christof Kohlhöfer is behind the camera. Together, the artists present abstruse scenarios and breathe a secret life into everyday things with anarchic humour and subversive magic.
title: The Whole Body Feels Light and Wants to Fly…
